name: GetGoing
long_description: GetGoing is a travel technology company simplifying the business of travel so that our partners can focus on running their core business.  Our travel search, booking, and advertising solutions seamlessly integrate complex technology and award-winning product design to serve the modern consumer and increase profitability for our partners.  Our clients include Fortune 500 corporations, travel management companies (TMCs), airlines and hotel chains, incentive management companies, and online retailers.
one_liner: We are building a "transparent opaque" airfare and hotel booking site…

name: NexTravel
long_description: NexTravel is a platform for companies to manage and streamline travel. We help companies get access to corporate/group negotiated rates for hotels, cars - making booking travel easier and more cost-effective. Email us at travel@nextravel.com or go to https://www.nextravel.com/ to find out more.
one_liner: NexTravel is a centralized travel booking platform that helps…
